name: A2addsite
tagline: Shell script to create new apache2 virtual hosts
body:
### A2addsite.
This script help you create a new apache2 virtual hosts quickly.

### Authors and Contributors
Make with love to apache2.In 2016, PhuHM (@hmphu)
[http://www.hmphu.com]

### Support or Contact
Having trouble? [contact me](mailto:me@hmphu.com)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
